languages.text: "Абеляр... я все хотела спросить... Как ты так держишься? Тебе не бывает... невыносимо без нее?"
"Abelard... I've been meaning to ask... How are you keeping it together so well? Don't you ever feel... awful without her?"
languages.original_text: "Абеляр... я все хотела спросить... Как ты так держишься? Тебе не бывает... невыносимо без нее?"

traits.locale_text: "Abelard... I've been meaning to ask... How are you keeping it together so well? Don't you ever feel... awful without her?"
"Abelard... I've been meaning to ask... How are you keeping it together so well? Don't you ever feel... awful without her?"
"Abelard... I've been meaning to ask... How are you keeping it together so well? Don't you ever feel... awful without her?"
"Abelard... I've been meaning to ask... How are you keeping it together so well? Don't you ever feel... awful without her?"

languages.text: “阿贝拉德，我一直想知道……你究竟是怎么跨过那道坎的？她不在的这段日子里……你不觉得很难熬吗？”
languages.original_text: "Abelard... I've been meaning to ask... How are you keeping it together so well? Don't you ever feel... awful without her?"

traits.locale_text: “阿贝拉德，我一直想知道……你究竟是怎么跨过那道坎的？她不在的这段日子里……你不觉得很难熬吗？”

languages.text: « Abélard... Je voulais vous demander... Comment vous faites pour ne pas craquer ? Vous ne vous sentez pas... dévasté, sans elle ? »
languages.original_text: "Abelard... I've been meaning to ask... How are you keeping it together so well? Don't you ever feel... awful without her?"

traits.locale_text: « Abélard... Je voulais vous demander... Comment vous faites pour ne pas craquer ? Vous ne vous sentez pas... dévasté, sans elle ? »

languages.text: "Abelard ... Ich will Euch schon seit einer Weile fragen ... Wie gelingt es Euch, so gefasst zu bleiben? Fühlt Ihr Euch denn nie ... einfach schrecklich, ohne sie?"
languages.original_text: "Abelard... I've been meaning to ask... How are you keeping it together so well? Don't you ever feel... awful without her?"

traits.locale_text: "Abelard ... Ich will Euch schon seit einer Weile fragen ... Wie gelingt es Euch, so gefasst zu bleiben? Fühlt Ihr Euch denn nie ... einfach schrecklich, ohne sie?

languages.text: 「アベラルド…前から聞こうと思っていたんだけど…いつもなぜそんなに冷静なの？彼女がいなくて…辛くならない？」
languages.original_text: "Abelard... I've been meaning to ask... How are you keeping it together so well? Don't you ever feel... awful without her?"

traits.locale_text: 「アベラルド…前から聞こうと思っていたんだけど…いつもなぜそんなに冷静なの？彼女がいなくて…辛くならない？」

languages.text: «Abelard... Llevo tiempo queriendo preguntarlo... ¿Cómo aguantas tan bien? ¿No te parece... espantoso que no esté ella?».
languages.original_text: "Abelard... I've been meaning to ask... How are you keeping it together so well? Don't you ever feel... awful without her?"

traits.locale_text: «Abelard... Llevo tiempo queriendo preguntarlo... ¿Cómo aguantas tan bien? ¿No te parece... espantoso que no esté ella?».

languages.original_text: "Abelard... I've been meaning to ask... How are you keeping it together so well? Don't you ever feel... awful without her?"

languages.text: "Abelard, soracaktım da unuttum, nasıl bu kadar soğukkanlı kalabiliyorsun? Onsuz hayat... Berbat değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "Abelard... I've been meaning to ask... How are you keeping it together so well? Don't you ever feel... awful without her?"

traits.locale_text: "Abelard, soracaktım da unuttum, nasıl bu kadar soğukkanlı kalabiliyorsun? Onsuz hayat... Berbat değil mi?"
